altername_name: Sega Ages: I Love Mickey Mouse: Fushigi no Oshiro Daibouken & I Love Donald Duck: Georgia Ou no Hihou
Sega Ages: Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse & QuackShot Starring Donald Duck
name: Sega Ages: I Love Mickey Mouse & I Love Donald Duck
overview: Sega Ages I Love Mickey Mouse: Fushigi no Oshiro Daibouken/I Love Donald Duck: Guruzia Ou no Hihou (アイラブ ミッキーマウス ふしぎのお城 大冒険 ／ アイラブ ドナルドダック グルジア王の秘宝) is a video game compilation for the Sega Saturn. Its extraordinarily long name comes from the fact it contains two games, both originally released as separate Sega Mega Drive games.
